name: Together (itch) (nibylev)
description:
Find out your objective in relation to other player. 

  • be present
  • be absent
  • run away
  • run after

Both players have to stay alive for 30 seconds to pass on to another round. 

Current version is for two XBOX contorllers. Walk with left stick, look around with right one.  Excuse large file size. Enjoy!
